Package org.chenile.http.init

package org.chenile.http.init
Contains HTTP service initialization code. It discovers Annotations and registers the controllers if they are also annotated as ChenileControllers.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.chenile.http
    Chenile key http packages and constants
    org.chenile.http.init.od
    Contains initialization code for specific mappings such as GetMapping, PostMapping etc.
    org.chenile.http.annotation
    Extended Chenile HTTP based annotations
    org.chenile.http.handler
    This package defines the HTTP entry point for invoking a Chenile service.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AnnotationChenileServiceInitializer
    Uses a Spring controller with additional annotations to initiate a Chenile Service.
    AnnotationTrajectoryInitializer
    Uses a special bean to configure all trajectories.
    HttpModuleBuilder
    Uses JSON configurations to initiate Chenile HTTP.
    TrajectoryPostprocessor
    Processes all the trajectories ConditionalOnTrajectory annotations.
